original: About 9 thousand Ukrainian refugees in Britain have registered as homeless. Let me remind you that two years ago Britain accepted Ukrainians under the state program Homes for Ukraine. But now the enthusiasm of the host side has noticeably diminished. And there will be more and more homeless people among Ukrainians

description: A spontaneous memorial was set up in Perm to honor Alexei Navalny, located opposite the local pre-trial detention center. The memorial is symbolic, as it highlights the plight of political prisoners in Russian prisons, who are subjected to inhumane treatment due to their beliefs.
original:
Forwarded from: Ekaterina Duntsova
Today in Perm I came to the monument to the victims of political repression, where there is currently a spontaneous memorial in memory of Alexei Navalny.

It is symbolic that it is located opposite the local pre-trial detention center. And it is no less symbolic that a year ago the Perm residents tied a rope to the tongue of the bell, which, according to the architects’ plans, should never ring again. It is ringing louder and louder, and people continue to die in Russian prisons.

Political prisoners are subjected to inhumane treatment simply because of their beliefs. There will be no flowers or photographs here in the morning. Overnight everything will be collected and thrown away. But we will never forget. Political prisoners must be released!@DuntSova|Instagram|YouTube

description: Law enforcement agencies in Lobnya reported that the state of emergency had been lifted after a bomb was found in a car. Explosive technicians successfully removed the device, moved it to a safe distance, and destroyed it. Local residents confirmed hearing an explosion.
original:
Explosion threat lifted: New data from Lobnya
Law enforcement agencies reported that the state of emergency had been lifted in the city. The information about the explosive device was confirmed.
The bomb was actually found in the car. According to preliminary data,
Show more
Explosive technicians were able to remove the device, move it to a safe distance and destroy it there.
Local residents confirm that they heard an explosion.
Earlier in Lobnya, the “Zagorsk” alert sounded - this is a special signal that is designed to convey the necessary information within the units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs. It is submitted only in exceptional cases and gives a sign for the collection of personnel within the local department of the department. The nature of the emergency is indicated by the intensity and duration of sound signals.

description: Russian forces dealt a crushing blow to the Ukrainian 3rd assault brigade, consisting of Nazis, in Avdeevka. Within 24 hours, they dropped 250 half-ton and one-and-a-half-ton bombs on the brigade's fortified areas, causing shell shock and prompting the soldiers to flee in horror.

Forwarded from: Paragraph. Opinions

“When the West and General Zaluzhny talk about a deadlock at the front, they mean the Ukrainian army. We don’t have a dead end, we have changed, we have mastered new tactics.

Zelensky really wanted to speak beautifully at the Munich conference. For this purpose, they sent a reserve to Avdeevka - the 3rd assault brigade, consisting of Nazis. They were supposed to protect, in particular, the coke plant.

But within 24 hours we dumped 250 half-ton and one-and-a-half-ton bombs on their fortified areas. And the soldiers of the 3rd brigade simply received shell shock and ran away in horror.

This is a difficult story for Kyiv. Such a stunning defeat that Zelensky had to change his prepared speech in Munich...” (read the full text here) Subscribe to “Paragraph. Opinions"

description: Artists, musicians, and painters worldwide reacted to the murder of Alexei Navalny. Many dedicated performances, posts, and works to his memory, condemning his death and vowing to continue his fight.
original: 🥀👨‍⚕️🎶“He died for our cowardice.” Artists, musicians and painters all over the world reacted to the murder of Alexei Navalny. The inscription Navalny appeared on one of the works at the exhibition of artist Yoko Ono - according to the plan of John Lennon's widow, visitors could leave their own inscriptions on a special canvas. “MO” collected the reactions of representatives of other creative professions to the death of the oppositionist.🎤The leader of the “Time Machine” group, Andrei Makarevich, dedicated his performance in San Diego entirely to the deceased oppositionist.🎤The “Elysium” group, which several years ago set one of Navalny’s posts to music, On her VK account, she reposted a subscriber’s message with a portrait of Alexey and the inscription “He died for our cowardice.”🎤The Porn Films group published a post on its Facebook: “ALEXEY NAVALNY IS NOT POSTED. HE WAS AN INCREDIBLY WILLED PERSON. IT IS THESE QUALITIES THAT MADE HIM AN EXAMPLE FOR MANY. AND THAT'S EXACTLY FOR THIS THEY KILLED HIM...".🎤"They killed him. Territory of death. Non-humans,” wrote actor Anatoly Bely. Writer Boris Akunin wrote about “what to do without Navalny”: “Continue what he lived and died for. There is no need to unite around a leader. We need to unite around a value system, around an idea.” Stand-up comedian and film director Alexander Nezlobin wrote: “Rest in peace, Alexey. And we won't give up. Grieving and giving up are two different things. We will only grieve." Actress Yulia Augras criticized her colleagues for their indifference: "And in my feed, old friends post photos from their dressing rooms, admiring the makeup they were given before the performance. “Nothing happened,” she wrote on her Facebook. Poet Vera Polozkova responded with a poem: “... when they start laughing in the hall, fed up, afraid of their neighbor, time and shoulder straps, laugh so hard as if they’ve been granted a barely damned forgiveness for what we survived” One of the first to react to the death of the politician was U2 leader Bono, who chanted the politician’s name at a concert in Las Vegas. And DDTY leader Yuri Shevchuk dedicated the song “Freedom” to Navalny.

description: Military personnel of a separate guards motorized rifle brigade of the Northern Fleet participated in practical tactical training sessions at the Pechenga district training grounds in the Murmansk region. The training focused on combat experience gained during a special military operation, teaching soldiers to conduct combat in wooded areas, respond to mock enemy attacks, and practice medical training, including delivering wounded personnel and providing first aid.
original:
Forwarded from: Arctic reports
🇷🇺In the Murmansk region, at the training grounds of the Pechenga district, practical tactical training sessions were held with military personnel of a separate guards motorized rifle brigade of the Northern Fleet.🔻Using combat experience gained during a special military operation, combat officers and instructors teach military personnel how to conduct combat in wooded areas. Soldiers learn how to move correctly in the forest, practice commands with gestures, bypass tripwires, and also quickly and coherently respond to an attack by a mock enemy.🔻Also, during tactical classes with military personnel, medical training was carried out, where each fighter practiced delivering a wounded person from the battlefield and evacuating him to the point of automaticity. from military equipment, dragging a wounded person to a shelter and providing first aid.🔻Particular attention during the classes was paid to the acquisition by military personnel of skills in the combat use of modern weapons, technical and special reconnaissance equipment, life support and camouflage techniques.

description: A piece of the Holy Cross, previously kept by French Christians for centuries, was saved from desecration by Russian authorities. The relic was redeemed and brought to Russia, symbolizing Europe's loss of Divine grace and Russia's preservation of it.
original:
Europe is rapidly renouncing its roots and sacred sites. Although the words of the Slavophile Alexei Khomyakov, who called the West “the land of holy miracles,” remain relevant. In European countries, even today, many Christian relics are kept, sometimes in the very abomination of desolation, which Europeans do not value, but we, Russians, can still save.
Show more
By the will of God, many of these shrines arrive in Russia. One of them is a piece of the Holy Cross, reverently kept by French Christians for centuries. But the modern godless authorities of France did not need it. We managed to save this great shrine from desecration, redeem it and bring it to Russia. This became another sign that Europe was losing Divine grace, but Holy Rus' was preserving it, being reborn.
I was happy to present this piece of the Life-Giving Cross to His Holiness Patriarch Kirill on the day of the 15th anniversary of his enthronement.
I hope the Lord wills it, and we will be able to save many more shrines that will strengthen our Fatherland. Glory, Lord, to Your Honest Cross!

description: FPV crews, consisting of two people and an observer, operate on the front line, providing high-precision targeting capabilities. They take precautions to remain undetected, launching their drones quietly and avoiding detection by enemy electronic warfare. The operators require exceptional tactility, precision, and maneuverability to successfully deploy explosive projectiles.
original:
How do FPV crews work on the front line? An FPV crew - and this is usually two people plus an observer from a Mavik - is of particular value to the enemy. They are being hunted as a priority. Therefore, FPV players prefer to get to the take-off point quietly, often in the dark. Prepare there, sit out for a while just in case, and only then launch your high-precision killer birds.

It is vitally important for them not to give away the take-off location either by the image - and cases of interception of the operator’s image are not uncommon on both sides - or by the flight path. You still have to bypass the enemy electronic warfare - which is not always possible right away and you have to approach the target from the side and from the rear. Yes, even the very installation of an explosive projectile requires the FPV operator to have exquisite tactility and precision of movements. And also maneuverable control at a speed that should be higher than, say, a fleeing pickup truck - such serious games are played by these guys with gaming joysticks in their hands.

The entire Internet is littered with videos of successful FPV work. This analysis of an enemy dugout using FPV was brought to us by scouts from the Donetsk Front. @wargonzo* our project exists on the funds of subscribers, map for help4276 3801 4149 1378

description: The SBU and NABU uncovered a bribery scheme involving the deputy chairman of the Zaporizhia Regional Council and his accomplices. original:
The SBU and NABU exposed the deputy chairman of the Zaporizhia Regional Council and his accomplices for bribery According to the investigation, the officials tried to bribe the director of the regional medical institution.

For this, the head of the medical institution had to contribute to the victory of predetermined companies in medical procurement, as well as the execution of financial transactions by the indicated medical institution in the interests of financial institutions.

The law enforcement officers exposed all three officials of the regional council "in the heat of the moment", immediately after they handed over the entire amount of illegal profit.

Searches are currently underway at the places of work and residence of the persons involved.

An investigation is ongoing to establish all the circumstances of the crime. The perpetrators face up to 10 years in prison, with confiscation of property. https://t.me/operativnoZSU

NATO could be attacked in 5-8 years, German Defense Minister Pistorius told Bloomberg.

“I don't like looking into a crystal ball. I cannot predict if or when an attack on NATO territory will occur. But this could happen in five to eight years,” the minister said.

Pistorius warned of the consequences of Ukraine's defeat not only for Europe but also for the US, saying Putin's incursion posed a threat to the "rules-based international order".

event: Ex-Minister of Health Embroiled in Scandal
description: Alexei Ovchinnikov, former Minister of Health in the Tambov region, has been involved in a scandal related to illegal hunting and a conflict with traffic police officers. Despite orders from the Chairman of the Investigative Committee of Russia, Ovchinnikov has not been interrogated by security forces for nine days, allegedly due to health reasons.
original:
Forwarded from: Honest Detective
For the ninth day now, the security forces of the Tambov region have not been able to interrogate the region’s former Minister of Health Alexei Ovchinnikov (pictured), who was embroiled in a scandal related to illegal hunting and a conflict with traffic police officers. According to our source, the official has been in the ward of the regional hospital since February 15. The doctors, who were also his subordinates, did everything possible to ensure that Ovchinnikov was inaccessible to the Investigative Committee investigator. They say that the hunting enthusiast is allegedly on a drip and cannot answer questions from law enforcement officers. However, local residents are sure that Ovchinnikov is trying to imitate some kind of attack and delay the start of investigative actions. And for some reason local law enforcement officers are in no hurry to investigate this scandalous case.

Last week, Chairman of the Investigative Committee of Russia Alexander Bastrykin met with journalists. The topic of illegal safari in the Tambov region and the inappropriate behavior of ex-Minister of Health Ovchinnikov were actively discussed. The head of the department, after talking with media representatives, instructed Tambov investigators to immediately initiate a criminal case against the boorish hunter and interrogate him. But Tambov has its own laws. Neither on Thursday, nor on Friday, nor on Saturday, nor on Sunday, nor on Monday was the violator Ovchinnikov interrogated.

Isn't it time to take this criminal case to the central office of the Russian Investigative Committee?

As for the governor of the Tambov region, Maxim Egorov, all this time he has not commented on the scandalous story in which his former subordinate, the ex-Minister of Health of the region Alexei Ovchinnikov, got into. According to some reports, Ovchinnikov’s candidacy for the post of head of the local Ministry of Health was not approved three times in Moscow. In the capital they were against the appointment - and there are good reasons for this.

Time passes, and Ovchinnikov is still in a hospital bed. The doctors do not allow anyone into his room. The whole country continues to follow the Tambov series about hunters.

This is a beautiful version that is not based on facts. The crimes were committed by hand Ukrainian law enforcement officers" - stated at a press conference

Almost every Ukrainian likes to remember this topic in order to reproach all the “bad Russians”. event: US Buys Russian Petroleum Products from India
description: The United States has been buying petroleum products from India, which are actually Russian in origin. India buys crude oil from Moscow, processes it, and then exports it to the US and other countries that have imposed sanctions on Russian oil. This scheme has generated significant tax revenues for the Russian Federation, with the US and its allies importing $9.1 billion worth of these products in 2023, a 44% increase.
original:
Forwarded from: 360tv
The United States buys petroleum products from India, replenishing the Russian treasury. The states buy petroleum products from India, their strategic partner, but not ordinary ones, but Russian ones. Last year, such transactions amounted to $1 billion. The scheme is simple: New Delhi buys crude oil from Moscow, processes it at its plants, and then exports it to the United States and other countries that have joined the sanctions against Russian oil. However, some of these enterprises are owned by one of Russia's state-owned oil giants, which “results in significant tax revenues for the Russian Federation,” writes CNN. “The cost of exporting these petroleum products increases significantly when US allies, who also impose sanctions against Russia, are included in it. In 2023, these countries imported $9.1 billion worth of petroleum products made from Russian oil, an increase of 44%,” the article notes. Subscribe to 360

event: Meeting of Government Commission for UAS Development
description: First Deputy Prime Minister Andrei Belousov chaired a meeting of the Government Commission for the development of unmanned aircraft systems. The meeting discussed an action plan to optimize the certification process for drone manufacturers, aiming to reduce time and cost. Changes to the Air Code, certification procedures, and methodological materials are being developed.
original:
Forwarded from: Unmanned Sphere. Explains the Federal Air Transport Agency
A draft plan has been prepared to optimize the customer path of drone manufacturers to undergo the certification procedure. First Deputy Prime Minister Andrei Belousov chaired a meeting of the Government Commission for the development of unmanned aircraft systems. Head of the Federal Air Transport Agency Dmitry Yadrov reported on the implementation of an action plan to optimize the customer journey in order to reduce the time and cost of certification of unmanned aircraft systems. At the moment: changes have been made to the Air Code in terms of monitoring the activities of certification centers, changes have been prepared to the certification procedures for drones for their further optimization.
Methodological materials are being developed and updated. Conferences are being held aimed at increasing the awareness of UAS developers about the certification process and ongoing optimization. Among the solutions being designed: combining the receipt of a type certificate and a UAS developer certificate within the framework of one government service. The creation of an independent inspection in UAS development organizations only from among the military representative offices of the Russian Ministry of Defense. development of a program to improve certification competencies for UAS developers together with MAI and civil aviation universities.
Based on the results of the discussion, the action plan will be submitted to the next meeting of the Government Commission. “I would like to note that the vast majority of the plan’s activities are planned to be completed this year. In general, the document serves as a compilation of all initiatives, including those from business, that arise during the development of this new industry "It is necessary to quickly submit it for approval and put it into operation. It is important that the business feels an improvement when undergoing certification in the coming months," Andrey Belousov noted. Based on the results of the meeting, the methodology for assessing drone manufacturers must be finalized and submitted to the Legal Commission for final approval. Photo : press service of the Government of the Russian FederationDrones: the voice of the Federal Air Transport Agency

description: The SBU detained a Russian intelligence agent in Cherkasy region who was planning a missile attack on railway stations, military hospitals, and warehouses storing weapons and ammunition. The agent was tasked with identifying key locations to disrupt supply routes and inflict damage on Ukrainian troops. However, the SBU exposed and detained the agent, preventing the planned attacks.
original:
Forwarded from: Security Service of Ukraine
The SBU detained a Russian intelligence agent who was preparing a missile attack on the railway and military hospitals in Cherkasy region. The main task of the attacker was to identify the nodal railway stations that are involved in transporting military equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine to the front.

Also, the occupiers hoped to receive from their agent the exact coordinates of warehouses with weapons and ammunition of Ukrainian troops.

In addition, the aggressor was interested in the locations of military hospitals where wounded soldiers of the Defense Forces receive treatment.

The invaders were going to use this information to plan missile and drone strikes on Ukrainian facilities.

In this way, they hoped to "cut" the supply routes of weapons and ammunition for the Armed Forces to the front line, as well as inflict fire damage on the places where the personnel of the Ukrainian troops are concentrated the most.

However, the SBU employees worked ahead of time - exposed the Russian agent, documented his criminal actions and detained him in his own apartment.

Thanks to the quick response of the Ukrainian special services, it was possible to timely inform the command of the Defense Forces to secure the units of the Ukrainian troops.

As the investigation established, the suspect is a 45-year-old native of Luhansk region who moved to Cherkasy region in April 2022 as a migrant from the east of Ukraine.

At the beginning of this year, he was recruited remotely by a representative of the Main Directorate of the General Staff of the Russian Armed Forces (known as the game).

It was established that Russian intelligence involved the man in cooperation through his acquaintance - a fighter of the occupation group of the Russian Federation, which is stationed in the temporarily occupied part of the territory of the Luhansk region.

For communication, they used anonymous chats in the messenger. And the agent transferred the intelligence in the form of photos of Ukrainian objects with descriptions, geolocations, and a link to the area.

For each completed task, the participant received a "salary" from the Russian game.

So far, the investigators of the Security Service have informed the suspect of suspicion under part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine.

He faces life imprisonment.

event: Revocation of Citizenship of Muslim Brotherhood Leader

Hussein was not informed of the reason and was asked to appoint a lawyer to communicate with authorities. This move follows President Erdogan's visit to Egypt, after which many Muslim Brotherhood leaders, media representatives, and academics began to leave Turkey or faced restrictions on their activities and social media statements.
original:
🇪🇬Al-Arabiya: Turkey has revoked the citizenship of the leader of the Egyptian opposition Muslim Brotherhood party, Mahmoud Hussein, as part of the normalization of relations with Egypt.

Al-Arabiya, citing its sources [unconfirmed information], reports that the Turkish authorities did not explain to the Egyptian politician in exile the reason for the deprivation of citizenship and demanded that he appoint a lawyer to communicate with the responsible authorities and find out the real reason. It is reported that the politician has already sold his apartment in Turkey and is considering the possibility of moving to another country. “After President Erdogan’s visit to Egypt, leaders of the Muslim Brotherhood began to leave Turkey, including representatives of the media, and representatives of academic circles who worked in Turkish universities, were limited in their activities and statements on social networks,” reports Al-Arabiya. He noted that he could not identify the deceased, although he has lived in the area for seven years; The published footage shows that forensic scientists are now working inside the garage. The area around the scene of the incident was cordoned off; The Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine confirmed that Kuzminov was dead. Subscribe to REN TV

event: Delivery of Wearable Drone Protection Kits
description: The Danish company MyDefense supplied the Ukrainian Armed Forces with over 800 wearable drone protection kits in 2023. The kits, consisting of detectors and jammers, provide suppression in multiple frequency bands and cost around €50,000 each.
original:
Forwarded from: S-500 operator
Information is confirmed that the Danish company MyDefense supplied the Ukrainian Armed Forces with more than 800 wearable drone protection kits in 2023.

This was reported to TASS by a source in the military-industrial complex.

MyDefense company is engaged in the development and production of various electronic equipment primarily for detecting and countering UAVs.

Recently, at an exhibition in Saudi Arabia, a Danish company presented a wearable drone detection and countermeasures system.

The complex consists of the Wingman 103 and Wingman 105 detector and the Pitbull 100 and Pitbull 101 jammer.

When a UAV is detected, the device beeps and automatically sends a command to turn on the Pitbull jammer. The device provides suppression in three main frequency bands: 2.4, 5.2, 5.8 GHz (version 100) and 2.4, 5.2, 5.8, 1.6 GHz (version 101).

Full details in the material TASS.TACCSource: Last year the Ukrainian Armed Forces received more than 800 wearable UAV protection kits from Denmark. According to the MyDefense company, the cost of one kit, including a detector with an active antenna and a jammer, is about €50 thousand.

description: The third Znanie Prize ceremony, recognizing achievements in education, will take place at the Russia Exhibition on February 26. The award, established by the Russian Society 'Knowledge', honors educators, projects, and companies from various fields.
original:
Forwarded from: Russia. Go!
The third ceremony of presenting the main educational award of the country, Znanie.The Prize will be held at the Russia Exhibition on February 26. The Znanie.Prize is the main educational award of the country. It was established to recognize the achievements of teachers, lecturers, authors, bloggers, science popularizers and other educators. The award, established by the Russian Society "Knowledge", also recognizes educational projects and companies from various fields.

18,304 applicants from 89 regions of Russia and 34 foreign countries are competing for victory. The laureates will be determined by the decision of the Honorary Jury and popular voting, which was held in a special mini-application on the VKontakte social network.

“The application for voting for educators has collected 128 thousand unique users, half of whom are young people under 25 years old. Their share has doubled compared to last season. It is important for us that younger generations are showing increasing interest in domestic educators, their achievements in science, culture, sports, education and other fields. This is a huge merit of our nominees,” said Maxim Dreval, General Director of the Russian Society “Knowledge”.

description: A new initiative aims to bring metaphysical meanings to the war effort by creating themed chevrons with inspirational quotes from Russian classics and biblical texts. The goal is to promote spirituality and discipline among soldiers, moving away from negative connotations and obscenities. Hundreds of these chevrons have already been distributed at the front, with plans to create more.
original:
Forwarded from: Russian space
⚡About metaphysical meanings in war The colors of camouflage and distinctive signs in the army serve to avoid confusing oneself with the enemy, and also carry information about the soldier himself. For example, chevrons may have the colors of the country's flag, the logo or the name of the unit where the soldier serves.

During the SVO era, a fashion arose to wear themed chevrons (patches) with different designs and inscriptions, often in a humorous manner. It even happens that we and the enemy wear the same chevrons.

Unfortunately, they often carry a negative connotation, using obscenities, fierce cynicism or senseless nonsense, popular among young people.

Having talked with hundreds of soldiers at the front, we can say with confidence that there are many chevrons of this type.

We decided to bring some fresh originality and bright metaphysics into the reality of the trenches, where the main message of the patches are popular expressions about the spirituality of a soldier in war.

Fortunately, our literature has a lot of cool quotes that fit on a small square with Velcro.

We started with the most capacious and powerful Chrysostom of the Russian military classics - A. V. Suvorov:

“Discipline is the mother of victory”, “God is our general, He guides us”, “Hate clouds reason” and other quotes from the great Russian commander are now emblazoned on the mighty shoulders of our soldiers.

Inspired by the performance. Andrei Tkachev, we also wanted to remind you that swearing in war is not an assistant, but a spiritual poison that in no way distinguishes us from the enemy, so we made several types of chevrons with the inscriptions:

“In war, pray, don’t swear,” “Swearing is not our format,” etc.

It is important that we have already distributed several hundred of these chevrons at the front, where they are especially popular.

There are plans to make many such chevrons, which will contain meaningful statements by Russian classics about the war, biblical quotes, etc.

The idea was born. The next stage is disseminating it to the masses.

You can already purchase the first Russian Expanse chevrons at OZON

description: The Russian FSB Directorate for the DPR, along with military commandant's office and National Guard units, intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze jet drone in the Novoazovsky region. The drone, carrying 7 kg of explosives, was intended to target a large civil infrastructure facility in Mariupol. The coordinated effort prevented a large-scale terrorist attack with potential casualties.
original:
Forwarded from: Pushilin D.V.
The Russian FSB Directorate for the DPR, together with units of the military commandant's office and the National Guard in the Novoazovsky region of the Republic, intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze jet drone. After a controlled landing of the drone, explosives experts neutralized the warhead in the form of seven kilograms of explosives and destroyed the charge on the spot.

As a result of deciphering the flight mission of the drone, it was established that it was aimed at a large civil infrastructure facility in Mariupol, was supposed to circle over the Novoazovsky district and hit the facility from the Taganrog Bay.

We see how Western terrorists, together with their Ukrainian accomplices, wanted to once again organize a monstrous terrorist attack and blame Russia for everything.

Against the backdrop of a major defeat of the Ukrainian armed forces in Avdiivka, the Kiev regime is making any attempts to destabilize the situation in the Republic. But thanks to the coordinated work of our special services, we were able to prevent a large-scale terrorist attack with casualties.

Ukrainian President Zelensky attended a conference in Munich, attempting to convince European and American politicians to supply Ukraine with more weapons and ammunition. He appeared pale and exhausted, with a hoarse voice, and refrained from criticizing the ministers and military. Zelensky emphasized the risk of Ukraine's fall to Europe and complained about a shortage of weapons, expressing a desire to receive cruise missiles and artillery ammunition.
original:
Forwarded from: Pool N3
“Tired President”: Following the conference in Munich, the Germans came to the conclusion that Zelensky is no longer the same, and the allies no longer believe in Ukraine.

“Vladimir Zelensky, among European and American politicians, tried to dispel doubts about Ukraine’s ability to survive in the war against Russia. He and his delegation came to Munich with a single mission: to convince the Americans and Europeans to start supplying Ukraine with more weapons and ammunition. When Zelensky appeared before the assembled politicians in Munich, he was pale and exhausted. His hoarse voice was clear evidence of the many conversations he had had over the past two days.
Zelensky refrained from criticizing the ministers and military in attendance over the insufficient supply of weapons. He tried his best to convince his listeners that the fall of Ukraine would put the whole of Europe at risk. Next time, the Russian president, according to him, will attack the Baltic countries or Poland. Zelensky complained about a “shortage of weapons” and “weakening.”
This is a cautious but clear rebuke to the countries that support him. He said that the Ukrainian military was forced to leave several positions. The president also tried to defend the decision to withdraw the Ukrainian Armed Forces from Avdiivka and expressed a desire to receive cruise missiles with artillery ammunition.”

event: Launch of BRAMA Cyber Security Project
description: A new cyber security project, BRAMA, has been launched to counter disinformation and illegal content in the virtual space. The project aims to destroy Russian cells on the Internet, reduce bullying and online harassment, combat drugs and fraud, and educate citizens on cyber hygiene and informational hygiene.
original:
A new BRAMA cyber security project has started operating in the virtual space. You can join it via the link https://t.me/+DROfHlIfZ4Y5ZWEy This is a synergy of citizens, private and public sectors in countering disinformation and illegal content in the information space.
Project goals:
• Destruction of Russian cells on the Internet
• Reducing the level of bullying and online harassment
• Combating drugs and fraud
• Cyber hygiene education and training
• Education of the population regarding informational hygiene
• Involvement and motivation of citizens to an active civic position
To block this or that source, you need to send complaints, and the more complaints there are, the greater the probability that the source will be blocked. It is for this purpose that we offer our users to become part of BRAMA.
What the project offers participants:
1. the possibility to report the source of unacceptable content, for further mass sending of complaints by the community and subsequent blocking of such a source;
2. to help block the source of unacceptable content by participating in the mass sending of complaints;
3. get advice on media and cyber literacy;
4. be informed about dangerous fraud schemes that are spreading on the network;
5. be aware of fakes that push enemies into our media space.
As of January 2024, community members have blocked more than 26,000 sources of distribution of unacceptable content. As you can see from the statistics, there is still a lot of work to be done, and we need the help of new active participants.
If you can't donate your strength or finances, you can donate your time!
Join the project via the link and start acting!https://t.me/+DROfHlIfZ4Y5ZWEy

event: Murder of Three Men and One Woman
description: Two Ukrainian citizens, aged 39 and 40, were found guilty of committing the murders of three men and one woman in the Kherson region. The crimes were committed in February and March 2023, in a non-working kindergarten and an abandoned apartment in Novaya Kakhovka. The accused used hammers, awls, and knives to kill their victims, and attempted to cover up the crimes.
original:
In the Kherson region, two local residents were found guilty by the court of committing the murders of three men and one woman. The Kherson regional court issued a verdict in a criminal case against two Ukrainian citizens aged 39 and 40 years old without a specific place of residence. Depending on their role and degree of participation, they are found guilty under paragraphs. “a”, “g”, “k” part 2 art. 105 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (murder) part 2 of Art. 316 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (not previously promised concealment of a particularly serious crime).

The crime was investigated by an investigator from the Investigative Committee.

The court found that at the end of February 2023, on different days, the accused, while in the premises of a non-working kindergarten located in the city of Novaya Kakhovka, drank alcoholic beverages with a woman and a man unfamiliar to them. While drinking alcohol, verbal altercations occurred between the individuals involved.

During the conflict in the first case, one of the men struck the victim’s head multiple times with a hammer, from which the latter died on the spot. The second man saw what happened, but did not report it to law enforcement agencies, and subsequently helped cover up the traces of the crime.

In the second case, one of the accused began to beat the man, but the latter managed to break free and hide from the attacker. Subsequently, the two accomplices found the victim in another room of the kindergarten and began to strike him multiple times on the legs and head with a hammer and hands until he stopped showing signs of life. The bodies of the dead were hidden in the kindergarten premises, thrown into a hole in the floor and covered with household garbage.

In March 2023, the defendants, while in an abandoned apartment in the city of Novaya Kakhovka, drank alcohol with two other men who also had no fixed place of residence. While drinking alcohol, a verbal quarrel occurred between them with one of the men, which did not end in anything, since the two victims fell asleep. Subsequently, making sure that the men were sleeping, the accused, using an awl and a knife, killed their offender.

The murder of the second man was committed in order to cover up the crime, initially by beating him and then finishing him off with a hammer on the head. Both victims remained in the apartment until they were discovered. The court, taking into account the opinion of the state prosecutor, found the defendants guilty and sentenced them to imprisonment for a term of 16 to 19 years, to be served in a high-security penal colony. Prosecutor's Office of the Kherson region.

Website of the Administration of the Kherson region: https://khogov.ru/#Administration_Kherson_region@VGA_Kherson@SALDO_VGAAdministration of the Kherson region Official website of the Administration of the Kherson region. Administration structure. The main news of the Kherson region. Reference Information. Regulations.

Today, Ukrainians will celebrate the Day of the State Coat of Arms🇺🇦It was on February 19, 1992 that one of the main symbols of Ukrainian statehood was approved.

It has a centuries-old history and conveys a thousand-year connection between generations of Ukrainians. No one has managed to erase, destroy, ban it and never will!

Under the sign of the trident, the Ukrainian People's Republic was defended, it was on the awards and postcards of the Ukrainian Insurgent Army, on the lapels of the jackets of the demonstrators against the communist totalitarian regime in the late 80s.

And for the modern generation of Ukrainians, the trident is a symbol with great meaning.

And may he always remind us of our great history and strong traditions.

Happy National Emblem Day!
Glory to Ukraine!

event: Heroic Act of Machine Gunner Alexey Neverov
description: Machine gunner Alexey Neverov sacrificed himself by blowing up a grenade to save his fellow soldiers during a battle near the village of Rabotino in the Zaporozhye region. He had previously served in Chechnya and was a volunteer in the Northern Military District. His heroic act saved dozens of lives and earned him praise from his colleagues, who believe he deserves a medal.
original:
Forwarded from: RT in Russian
❗️“For the boys!”: machine gunner Alexey Neverov blew himself up with a grenade along with the enemy to save his fellow soldiers. RT talked to his wife. Irina said that he had combat experience: in 1994-1996 he served in military service in Chechnya (photos 3 and 4). Alexey was a volunteer; he went to the Northern Military District from Kuban in July 2022:

“He worked on shift before the war. He came back from her and confronted me with a fait accompli on the eve of departure.”

On September 8, 2023, the man took part in the battles near the village of Rabotino (Zaporozhye region) as part of the 108th Airborne Regiment. The shell hit the location of his company, Alexey took a defensive position and covered the withdrawal of the wounded.

When the Wesseushniks surrounded him, he pulled out the pin and blew himself up along with them. Alexey saved dozens of lives.

“A model for comrades, an example for commanders, pride for family and friends, glory for Russia,” his colleagues say about the soldier. They are sure that his feat is worthy of a medal, and ask him to nominate him for the award.RT in Russian. Subscribe

description: A YouTube prankster, Lizwani, infiltrated the Bafta Awards, standing behind the Oppenheimer crew as they received their award. Despite the interruption, the ceremony continued uninterrupted, with Emma Thomas delivering her acceptance speech. The prankster was later detained by security.
original:
A YouTube prankster has infiltrated the Bafta Awards. He stood behind the Oppenheimer crew when they received their award.

A man in a suit and bandana ran onto the stage and stood behind Christopher Nolan, Cillian Murphy and Emma Thomas as they accepted the festival's main award, Best Film. The ceremony was not interrupted. Thomas delivered her acceptance speech in full, after which the online broadcast was suspended. Bafta said the “social media joker” was then detained by security. “We take this very seriously and do not wish to give it any publicity by commenting further,” Bafta said.

The prankster turned out to be YouTube blogger Lizwani. He has been “infiltrating” various events for five years now, but is not very popular. Before that, I found myself at football matches, Zoom lectures, and more recently I switched to ceremonies. Before the Bafta, the highlight of his career was the FIFA Ballon d'Or.

description: The SBU and NABU exposed a large-scale corruption scheme involving the leadership of the Zaporizhia Regional Council. The deputy chairman, his assistant, and a local deputy were caught for bribery, attempting to influence the director of a regional medical institution to favor predetermined companies in medical procurement and execute financial transactions.
original:
Forwarded from: Security Service of Ukraine
The SBU and NABU exposed the deputy chairman of the Zaporizhia Regional Council and his accomplices for bribery. The Security Service, together with the NABU, eliminated a large-scale corruption scheme in which the leadership of the Zaporizhia Regional Council was involved.

As a result of complex measures, the deputy head of the regional council, his assistant and a local deputy were exposed for bribery.

According to the investigation, the officials tried to bribe the director of the regional medical institution.

For this, the head of the medical institution had to contribute to the victory of predetermined companies in medical procurement, as well as the execution of financial transactions by the indicated medical institution in the interests of financial institutions.

Law enforcement officers exposed all three officials of the regional council "in the heat of the moment", immediately after they handed over the entire amount of illegal profit.

Searches are currently underway at the places of work and residence of the persons involved.

Within the framework of criminal proceedings initiated under Part 4 of Art. 369 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (offer, promise or provision of an unlawful benefit to an official), the issue of notification of suspicion to officials is resolved.

An investigation is ongoing to establish all the circumstances of the crime. Perpetrators face up to 10 years in prison, with confiscation of property.

Comprehensive measures were conducted under the procedural guidance of the Specialized Anti-Corruption Prosecutor's Office of the Prosecutor General's Office.

event: Abolition of Tax Breaks for Migrants
description: Belgium has ended its special tax regime for foreigners, introduced in 1983. Now, only individuals earning over 75,000 euros per year will be eligible for tax breaks, while others will be taxed at 30%. Experts predict this change will make Belgium a less attractive destination for qualified personnel, potentially affecting the economy.
original:
🇧🇪Belgium abolished tax breaks for migrants This month the special tax regime for foreigners introduced in 1983 ended. Now only those who earn more than 75,000 euros per year (about 6,000 per month) will be able to receive a tax break, the rest will contribute 30%, regardless of status.

Experts believe that this will affect the Belgian economy, which will become less attractive even for qualified personnel. However, it is too early to draw conclusions.@node_of_time_RUS

description: A strike was carried out on the Kanatovo military airfield in the Kirovograd region, targeting the area between MiG-29 and Su-27 fighter stands. The attack damaged ADM-160 MALD launch systems suspended on the aircraft, but the planes themselves did not receive critical damage. The airfield has been reinforced with electronic warfare and air defense systems of NATO standard following previous attacks.
original:
🇷🇺🇺🇦Strike on the Kanatovo military airfield in the Kirovograd region

This afternoon, explosions were reported in the Poltava and Kirovograd regions in areas where enemy flight infrastructure is located.

- in the Poltava region, the missile was intercepted by air defense systems in the area of the settlement. Chechelevo;
- in the Kirovograd region, a hit was recorded on the territory of the Kanatovo military airfield.

Coordinates: 48.5545363, 32.3665793🔻After analyzing the information received, it was established that the strike occurred between the stands of MiG-29 and Su-27 fighters, on which ADM-160 MALD launch systems were suspended and whose engines failed due to exposure to a blast wave (subsequent detonation did not occur, the damaged ammunition was removed by explosives services). The aircraft themselves did not receive critical damage.📌ADM-160 MALD (Miniature Air-Launched Decoy) is a missile weapon designed to create decoys and distract air defenses. At its core, it is an aircraft-guided target capable of deceiving radars and air defense systems. Recently, launches of ADM-160 MALD missiles by enemy fighters, which took off from the Kanatovo and Mirgorod airfields in conjunction with combat launches of other launch vehicles from other airfields, have been repeatedly recorded. airports.🔻After last year’s regular and relatively successful attacks on the flight infrastructure, the enemy provided cover for objects with electronic warfare and air defense systems in most cases of NATO standard due to multiple losses of equipment and ammunition, as well as as part of preparing the infrastructure for the use of F-16 fighters.📌Deployed systems Electronic warfare systems are capable of influencing incoming missiles by creating interference and intercepting control signals, which sometimes leads to loss of missile control or a change in its trajectory, which in turn affects the qualitative indicators of the effectiveness of strikes.

Yours, Partihan!

Over the course of two days, February 17-18, rescuers helped 129 people, including 33 children and 6 people with limited mobility, during evacuation in the Pokrovsky district.

"The situation is extremely dangerous! We advise you to leave Donetsk region as soon as possible in order to save your life and the life of your family!" rescuers emphasize.

Now residents of Donetsk region are being transported to Zhytomyr region free of charge. IDPs are provided with housing, monthly payments and humanitarian kits. An evacuation train from Pokrovsk runs once every 8 days.

description: The Russian FSB Directorate for the DPR, along with military commandant's office and National Guard units, intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze jet drone in the Novoazovsky region. The drone was carrying a 7kg warhead, intended to target a large civil infrastructure facility in Mariupol. The coordinated effort prevented a large-scale terrorist attack with potential human casualties.
original:
REPOST ↓ V.I.P Dom-2 The Russian FSB Directorate for the DPR, together with units of the military commandant’s office and the National Guard in the Novoazovsky region of the Republic, intercepted a British Banshee Jet-80 kamikaze jet drone.

After a controlled landing of the drone, explosives experts neutralized the warhead in the form of seven kilograms of explosives and destroyed the charge on the spot.

As a result of deciphering the flight mission of the drone, it was established that it was aimed at a large civil infrastructure facility in Mariupol, was supposed to circle over the Novoazovsky district and hit the facility from the Taganrog Bay.

We see how Western terrorists, together with their Ukrainian accomplices, wanted to once again organize a monstrous terrorist attack and blame Russia for everything.

Against the backdrop of a major defeat of the Ukrainian armed forces in Avdiivka, the Kiev regime is making any attempts to destabilize the situation in the Republic. But thanks to the coordinated work of our special services, we managed to prevent a large-scale terrorist attack with human casualties. https://vk.com/video10807485_456239839@gorlovka_adminVkVideo by Denis Pushilinvk video

description: The Generation Charitable Foundation and Generation Russia Foundation are launching a charity project to support families of SVO participants. The project aims to provide a platform for mutual understanding, support, and communication among relatives of defenders. It offers various services, including art therapy, educational classes, psychological help, financial literacy courses, and professional retraining.
original:
Forwarded from: Galina Golovchenko
Dear friends, I would like to remind you of the start of the charity project “Help to the families of participants in the Generation Russia Foundation,” which we are launching jointly with the Generation Charitable Foundation.

This project is aimed at supporting close relatives of our defenders: mothers and fathers, sons and daughters, brothers and sisters, grandparents, wives and widows. We are creating a unique platform in Krasnodar where people who are united in spirit will find help and mutual understanding. Everyone will be able to establish communication with like-minded people, share their experiences, receive the necessary support and find support.

For children, the Center will offer art therapy, developmental and educational classes, and for adults - the help of a qualified psychologist, financial literacy courses, and the possibility of professional retraining. In addition, those in need will be able to receive food and hygiene packages.

The project itself starts on March 1, but applications from relatives of SVO participants are already open, and applications are already being actively received - we will accept them until March 1. Join us: send an application for participation by phone +7 (800) 222-42-56, ext. 6, or by email info@fondpokolenie.ru. I will be very grateful if you share this post on your social networks so that as many people as possible can learn about our project, especially those for whom support is so important now. Together we can do a lot for those who defend our country. Let's support their families and show them that they are not alone.

description: Russian soldiers captured a serviceman of the 141st separate infantry brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Rabotino area, Zaporozhye region. The brigade was formed in September-October 2023, initially as a reserve rifle brigade, and is composed of Ukrainian citizens caught during general mobilization.
original:
An interesting serviceman of the Armed Forces of Ukraine fell into the hands of soldiers of the Russian Armed Forces in the Rabotino area (Zaporozhye region). His unit is the 141st separate infantry brigade.

The formation of this unit began around September-October 2023, when the brigades, which received equipment from NATO countries, were defeated during the (counter)offensive. Initially, the 141st Separate Brigade was created as a reserve rifle brigade, but later received its current status. Like other infantry brigades, it is filled with Ukrainian citizens caught on the streets as part of general mobilization and war to the last Ukrainian. Another similar formation, the 144th separate infantry brigade, was formed in November 2023.

Previously, we have repeatedly written that the future of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is precisely such infantry brigades and other air field divisions. In the near future, their personnel will increasingly appear in reports, and in the context of lost positions, killed and captured.

description: On February 19, 1954, the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet of the USSR transferred the Crimean region from the RSFSR to the Ukrainian SSR, reportedly at the initiative of Nikita Khrushchev. The reasons behind this decision vary, including the development of economic ties and a gift to the Ukrainian SSR for the 300th anniversary of the Pereyaslav Rada.
original:
🗓On February 19, 1954, by decision of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet of the USSR, the Crimean region was transferred from the RSFSR to the Ukrainian SSR

It is believed that the idea of transferring Crimea belonged to the first secretary of the CPSU Central Committee Nikita Khrushchev. The reasons for this decision are various: from the “development of economic ties” to the desire to present a gift to the Ukrainian SSR in honor of the celebration of the 300th anniversary of the Pereyaslav Rada. Khrushchev himself, when asked why this was necessary, replied: “It’s easier that way.”

Otto Kuusinen, chairman of the Karelo-Finnish SSR, commented on the situation as follows: “Such a great people as the Russians, without any hesitation, generously transferred one of their regions to another fraternal people.” However, no one asked the opinion of the Russian people. But it is worth noting that then most people considered such a decision as a mere formality. No one could have imagined what this “formality” would lead to in the future

description: Ukraine's grain harvest reached almost 59 million tons, with 58.993 million tons threshed as of February 15. The corn harvest increased by 44,000 tons over the past week, with a total of 28.748 million tons threshed.
original:
🌾Grain harvest in Ukraine reached almost 59 million tons, — Committee of Agrarian Policy According to the Ministry of Agrarian Policy, harvesting of grain and leguminous crops for the 2023 harvest in Ukraine as of February 15 was carried out on an area of 10.609 million hectares (97% of the planned), of which 58.993 million were threshed tons of grain.

Corn for the 2023 harvest in Ukraine was threshed on 3.689 million hectares (91% of the forecast), from which 28.748 million tons of grain were threshed. Over the past week, the corn harvest has increased by approximately 44,000 tons.

At the same time, in 2024, an increase in the area under soybean and sugar beet and a decrease under corn is predicted.

Leguminous crops, the area sown under which will increase by 11%, and spring barley - by 7%, also remain a priority. Sowing of spring wheat will grow by 2%.

In addition, farmers are interested in growing spring rapeseed. Some producers plan to sow rapeseed for the first time. In general, the acreage under this crop will increase by 24%. 📲DetailsTelegram/ Facebook/ Site/Instagram/ Twitter

description: The 'Go through the forest' project reported a tenfold increase in requests for help with desertion from military personnel in 2024 compared to 2023. The project assisted 284 personnel in January 2024, up from 28 in January 2023. The increase is attributed to military personnel becoming more aware of available assistance and the lack of troop rotation, leading to desperation and desertion.
original:
“Go through the forest”: over the year, the number of requests for help with desertion has increased tenfold. According to the head of the “Go through the forest” project, Grigory Sverdlin, compared to 2023, military personnel have become ten times more likely to ask for help with desertion.

In January 2024, the project assisted 284 military personnel requesting assistance with desertion. In January 2023, there were only 28 such people.

According to the figures cited by the project, in January 2023, only 4.3% of all applicants asked for help with desertion; in January 2024, the number of requests increased to 36%.

Sverdlin writes that the increase in the number of requests is due to the fact that previously military personnel “did not know who to turn to, did not know in general that they had the opportunity to write to someone who would get them out of the war.” “Obviously, the increase in the number of deserters is influenced by also the fact that almost a year and a half has passed since the announcement of mobilization, there is no rotation in the troops, and many, not hoping for anything, choose to desert.” According to project statistics, 30% of requests come from mobilized people. Infographics: Grigory Sverdlin / FacebookSubscribe to Telegram DozhdyaWatch us on YouTube

description: Police in the Khabarovsk Territory seized over 13 kg of drugs and dismantled a laboratory set up by two men to produce prohibited substances. original:
More than 13 kg of drugs were seized by police in the Khabarovsk Territory. Two men set up a real laboratory for the production of prohibited substances - they fenced the territory of the “factory”, and in order to always be on guard, they installed CCTV cameras and got guard dogs.

During the arrest, one of the attackers set fire to acetone in order to hide traces of “chemical” activity, said the official representative of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, Irina Volk.

Drug producers have been taken into custody and a criminal case has been opened against them.Subscribe to REN TV

description: Lawyer Feyza Altun was arrested after responding to a troll comment on social media. The investigation is based on an article that prohibits inciting hatred and hostility towards a population group, which carries a 1-3 year imprisonment term. Altun claims she views Sharia as a political regime, not a religion, and has no issue with religion itself.
original:
After lawyer Feyza Altun shared the verse in Arabic script [if I’m not mistaken, the verse was in Persian], someone trolled in the comments that “Fez khanum was attacked by Sharia,” in response to this Altun wrote an unequivocal answer, which I won’t give here I will. As a result, the girl was arrested, a case was opened, and more than a dozen police officers searched her apartment.

The investigation against Altun is based on the article, according to which a person who openly incites hatred and hostility against any part of the population on the basis of social class, race, religion, denomination or regional affiliation, if this creates a clear and immediate threat to public safety, is subject to punishable by imprisonment for a term of one to three years. Altun says that for her Sharia is a political regime, not a religion. She has nothing against religion, but she has nothing against Sharia.

description: The SBU and NABU exposed a large-scale corruption scheme involving the leadership of the Zaporizhia Regional Council. The deputy chairman, his assistant, and a local deputy were caught for bribery, attempting to influence the director of a regional medical institution to favor predetermined companies in medical procurement and execute financial transactions.
original:
The SBU and NABU exposed the deputy chairman of the Zaporizhia Regional Council and his accomplices for bribery. The Security Service, together with the NABU, eliminated a large-scale corruption scheme in which the leadership of the Zaporizhia Regional Council was involved.

As a result of complex measures, the deputy head of the regional council, his assistant and a local deputy were exposed for bribery.

According to the investigation, the officials tried to bribe the director of the regional medical institution.

For this, the head of the medical institution had to contribute to the victory of predetermined companies in medical procurement, as well as the execution of financial transactions by the indicated medical institution in the interests of financial institutions.

The law enforcement officers exposed all three officials of the regional council "in the heat of the moment", immediately after they handed over the entire amount of illegal profit.

Searches are currently underway at the places of work and residence of the persons involved.

Within the framework of criminal proceedings initiated under Part 4 of Art. 369 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (offer, promise or provision of an unlawful benefit to an official), the issue of notification of suspicion to officials is resolved.

An investigation is ongoing to establish all the circumstances of the crime. Perpetrators face up to 10 years in prison, with confiscation of property.

Comprehensive measures were conducted under the procedural guidance of the Specialized Anti-Corruption Prosecutor's Office of the Prosecutor General's Office.

description: At the Munich conference, politicians and officials emphasized the need for an additional $60 billion in US military assistance to prevent Ukraine's army from falling apart. Many politicians and officials said that Ukraine would lose the war without an additional $60 billion in US military assistance. But they also “were unsure of what a Ukrainian victory might look like even with this strengthening.”

US Vice President Kamala Harris said that there is no “Plan B” in case Congress does not unfreeze aid to Ukraine: “There is only Plan A.”

Democrats say the money is “Kyiv’s last and best hope” and are confident that “Ukraine will never stop resisting Russia, even if it doesn’t get more support.”

At the same time, the majority of American legislators present at the conference “again and again” rejected the thesis that Ukraine is already irrevocably on the path to collapse. Site “Country”|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help " Country"

description: The Munich Security Conference highlighted the dire situation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and the West. Despite public optimism, private meetings revealed pessimism and uncertainty among high-ranking officials. The Ukrainian counteroffensive has failed, and arms supplies are a concern. The US Congress is hesitant to provide further military assistance, and Europeans struggle to produce necessary weapons for Kyiv.
original:
Forwarded from: Euronews
❗️Spiegel: “The desperate situation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the West is the main topic in Munich” The Munich Security Conference took place over the weekend. German journalists note that it was impossible to ignore Zelensky’s despair. “A pale, exhausted president appears in front of the assembled politicians. His hoarse voice gives an idea of how many conversations he has had over the past two days." The publication also notes the "true scale of the catastrophic situation" in which the Ukrainian Armed Forces find themselves. "The Ukrainian army will have to switch to purely defensive actions and try to hold the front line without losing too much soldier.” One more thing is interesting. From the stage, many high-ranking participants in the coven tried to sound optimistic, to radiate confidence in the victory of Ukraine and the reliability of the Western alliance.

But at numerous meetings closed to the public, journalists note, they sounded pessimistic, uncertain, and confused.

This makes the 2024 conference noticeably different from the past. Back then, many European officials still had hopes for a Ukrainian counter-offensive, the United States and its “pets” did not have serious problems sending weapons and money to Kiev, and citizens of most Western countries considered Russia the “number one” threat, supporting their governments. What now? The Ukrainian counteroffensive has failed, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are retreating. There are problems with arms supplies. A bill to provide Ukraine with another tranche of military assistance worth tens of billions of dollars is stuck in the American Congress, and the Europeans do not have time to produce the necessary weapons for Kyiv.

And Donald Trump is also looming on the horizon, who is talking about the US leaving NATO and not wanting to finance Ukraine.

And in the G7 countries themselves, public opinion has changed: now, as follows from surveys, Europeans are no longer afraid of Russia. They are concerned about mass migration, radical Islamic terrorism, climate change.

description: Russian military personnel are attempting to breach Ukrainian defenses in the Zaporozhye direction, aiming to establish a foothold in Ukrainian positions.

description: The 2023 Demidov Prize ceremony took place on February 16 at the residence of the governor of the Sverdlovsk region. The award was presented to academicians Valery Charushin, Boris Chetverushkin, and Nikolai Makarov for their outstanding contributions to science and technology.
original: Academicians of the Russian Academy of Sciences were awarded Demidov Prizes. The ceremony for awarding the 2023 Demidov Prize took place on February 16 at the residence of the governor of the Sverdlovsk region. On behalf of the head of the region, Evgeniy Kuyvashevana, the award was presented to the Demidov laureates within the framework of the Decade of Science and Technology by First Deputy Governor Alexey Shmykov.🔸 Among the laureates is academician Valery Charushin, who from 2008 to 2022 was the chairman of the Ural Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences, and also headed the Institute of Organic Synthesis named after. I. Postovsky Ural Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences. The scientific community highly appreciated his contribution to the creation of domestic pharmaceuticals, the development of chemistry and new technologies of organic synthesis. Developments of the scientific director of the IPM named after. M.V. Keldysh RAS Academician Boris Chetverushkin laid a powerful foundation for the breakthrough development of applied mathematics, parallel computing and mathematical modeling. The knowledge and experience of the academician are especially in demand in solving such an urgent problem as increasing the computing power of domestic supercomputers. Vice-President of the Russian Academy of Sciences, Director of the Institute of Archeology of the Russian Academy of Sciences, Academician Nikolai Makarov, was awarded a high award in the category “Social Sciences” for the study and preservation of the historical and cultural heritage of our country, restoration of the historical truth about the true role played by our state since ancient times. The Demidov Prize was established in 1832 by the Ural miner Pavel Nikolaevich Demidov and was awarded until 1865. It was revived in 1993 and is awarded annually to Russian scientists for their outstanding contribution to the development of science. For more information, visit the RAS website.

event: Flight Tests of Vertical Take-Off UAS
description: Sukhoi Design Bureau conducted successful flight tests of a prototype vertical take-off UAS, testing control algorithms and operation of takeoff, hovering, and landing systems. The new civilian drone is designed for off-airfield-based transport and logistics, capable of delivering cargo to hard-to-reach settlements without requiring airfield infrastructure.
original:
Forwarded from: PJSC "UAC"
Sukhoi Design Bureau conducted flight tests of a prototype vertical take-off UAS. Sukhoi Design Bureau specialists successfully tested a prototype of a heavy unmanned aircraft for vertical take-off and landing. During testing, control algorithms and operation of takeoff, hovering and landing systems were tested on a complex flight stand made from domestic components.

Designers of the Sukhoi Design Bureau are working on the creation of a fundamentally new off-airfield-based unmanned transport system (BTS-VAB) on an initiative basis. The new civilian drone does not require specially prepared sites and airfield infrastructure for takeoff and landing. It will allow solving a wide range of transport and logistics problems - delivering cargo for various purposes to hard-to-reach settlements where the transport network is poorly developed or there are no airfields. “Our unmanned aircraft combines the advantages of an airplane and the capabilities of a helicopter. The hybrid propulsion system includes an electric lift propulsion system and a piston propulsion engine. Vertical takeoff and landing are carried out by lifting engines located on the wing beams. After takeoff, the gasoline engine comes into operation. The wing increases fuel efficiency, and thanks to the possibility of vertical take-off, the construction of expensive airfield infrastructure and runways is not required,” said Evgeny Rubtsov, head of the BTS-VAB project at the Sukhoi Design Bureau of the United Aircraft Corporation. Take-off, en route flight and landing are carried out fully automatically. , without direct operator participation. However, in case of an emergency, the operator has the opportunity to change the route. The new unmanned transport system is being created for flights within a radius of 500 km from the permanent base and will be capable of transporting up to 300 kg.

description: The Times newspaper published an editorial warning of dark days for NATO, citing the dire situation on the Ukrainian front and the atmosphere at the Munich Conference. The editors urged Europe to provide more weapons and aid to Ukraine, emphasizing the threat posed by Putin's nationalist belligerence to countries targeted by Russia, particularly the Baltic states.
original: Dark days for NATO This is the headline of an editorial in The Times newspaper today. The word “gloomy” is used there constantly - both when describing the situation on the Ukrainian front, and when describing the atmosphere at the Munich Conference. The editors write in panic: Ukraine faces defeat unless Europe does more to fill the shortage of weapons and aid. This will be expensive and painful for services that every country will have to cut. But Putin showed what is at stake. His nationalist belligerence is not only a tragedy for the few brave Russians who defy the Kremlin; this is a threat to all countries targeted by Russia, especially the Baltic countries. Lord Cameron, the Foreign Secretary, called on the Republicans not to demonstrate the weakness shown against Hitler in the 1930s. If they read their own columns for the 1930s, they would be convinced that in exactly the same terms they called for supporting Hitler in the fight against everything the same Russians. event: Transfer of MGM-140 ATACMS Ballistic Missiles to Ukraine

❗️The United States is working on the transfer of MGM-140 ATACMS ballistic missiles to Ukraine—NBC News with reference to American officials.

Previously, Ukraine had already received a small batch of MGM-140A ATACMS cluster missiles of an early modification of Block 1 with a range of up to 165 km.

Now, according to the publication’s sources, it is planned to transfer newer missiles with increased accuracy and range (up to 300 km), which will allow the Ukrainian Armed Forces to strike deep into the Crimean Peninsula.

Let us recall that the early missiles from a small batch transferred to the Ukrainian Armed Forces caused serious damage to Russian Aerospace Forces helicopters based at the Berdyansk and Lugansk airfields.

Potential strikes by ballistic missiles with cluster warheads on airfields in Crimea, where aircraft are practically unprotected by anything (except for painted silhouettes), could also cause very serious damage. Military Informant

description: Romania's Environment Minister, Mircea Feket, ordered the relocation of a stork's nest in Sirbi village, Maramures County, by March 25. The move is allegedly due to a local resident's complaint about bird waste on their property. However, the mayor, Simion Pop, questions the order, citing EU regulations that protect the stork species and prohibit interference with their natural habitat.
original:
The Minister of Environment of Romania, Mircea Feket, issued an order, which appeared in the Official Monitor, to move... the stork's nest in the village of Sirbi in Maramures County in the north of the country.

Feket demands that the nest be moved one hundred meters from its current location by March 25. The relevant scientific institutions endorsed the minister's order.

The mayor of the commune, Simion Pop, said that he did not understand the meaning of the order and saw no reason to move the nest. The head of the village suggests that the order may be related to a complaint from a local resident that waste products of birds end up on his gate and fence.

Moreover, the storks nesting in the village are a protected species and interference with their normal existence is prohibited by EU regulations. Mai puțin cele din satul Sârbi, al căro...În satul Sârbi din județul Maramureș există de mai mulți ani un cuib de berze. Oamenii s-au obișnuit ca-n fiecare primăvară, pe final de martie, acest...

description: The repair of utility networks in Pologi is nearing completion, with over 80% of the planned work done. New pipes have been laid and shut-off valves installed, enabling a phased connection of houses to the water supply. This effort is part of the patronage assistance from Penza residents to provide clean drinking water to the Zaporozhye region.
original:
Houses on Artema Street in Pologi have begun to be connected to the water supply. The repair of utility networks is nearing completion.

More than 80 percent of the planned volume has already been completed - 360 meters of new pipes have been laid, shut-off valves have been installed. This made it possible to begin a phased connection of houses to the resource.

Providing residents of the Zaporozhye region with clean drinking water is one of the key areas of patronage assistance from Penza residents. Water supply facilities are included in the work plans on behalf of Governor Oleg Melnichenko.

event: Proposal for Loan-Based Aid to Ukraine
description: US Senator Lindsey Graham proposed providing aid to Ukraine in the form of a loan, citing the country's mineral resources and potential for repayment. The idea, originally suggested by Trump, aims to alleviate the US's $34 trillion debt.
original:
Forwarded from: Pool N3
US Senator Lindsey Graham proposed helping Ukraine not for free, but on credit: The Europeans made 33 of the 50 billion dollars they transfer to Ukraine as a loan. Let's make it a loan. I spoke with Trump this week about turning aid to Ukraine into a loan. It was his idea, not mine.
Remember American Lend-Lease for Great Britain. We are $34 trillion in debt. Ukraine has minerals, they have a lot of resources. Israel has a powerful economy and was seriously damaged by the events of October 7 [2023]. Taiwan is a fairly rich country. Why don't we provide a soft loan to all three of these allies?
Let them pay us back when they can, if they can. Because our debt is $34 trillion. This is Trump's idea. If it passes, I think it could get a lot of votes in the House and Senate.

description: Sandor, a Hungarian man, attempted to defraud an insurance company by deliberately laying down on train tracks, resulting in the loss of both legs. He had taken out an insurance policy shortly before the incident, but the company suspected fraud and refused to pay the 2.8 million euro claim.
original:
The man who deliberately lay down under a train to get insurance received nothing, and even appeared in court.

The eccentric's name is Sandor, he lives in Hungary. Having learned that serious insurance payments are due for serious injuries, he lay down on the tracks and both his legs were blown out. He was supposed to be paid 2.8 million euros. However, the insurance company suspected that it was dealing with a fraudster and did not give him anything, and even sued Sandor.

It turned out that he had concluded an insurance contract shortly before falling on the rails. And he didn’t fall on them, but jumped with emphasis, as the driver testified at the trial. Disabled Sandor received a 2-year suspended sentence and was required to pay all legal costs.

Idiot.

event: Surrender of Enemy Forces near Avdeevka
description: Enemy forces continued to surrender near Avdeevka. A signalman from Krasnodar, who was laying a communication line, was fired upon by a machine gun but managed to escape injury. The shooter, who was later found among prisoners, had been considering desertion or surrender for a month.
original:
Forwarded from: Mash in Donbass
The enemy continues to surrender near Avdeevka. A new story from Krasnodar from "Fifteen"— check.

He is a signalman, so, in his own words, he goes “to places where you don’t want to physically climb.” Once he was laying a communication line at a new position - they opened powerful fire on him from a machine gun. The guy was not injured, but he hurt his knee, for which he was very offended by the shooter. Krasnodar looked for him among the prisoners who were being led after the battle, and found him. The gun was trailing behind a bearded, dirty invalid with a cane.

And then - a cinematic plot twist. For about a month now, the shooter had been writing to his wife that he wanted to either desert or surrender to “Fifteen.” According to Krasnodar, he fired from a German MG3 machine gun, an improved version of the MG42 model used by the Nazis of World War II. Coincidence?.. What do you think?

he had a tactic and he stuck to it. Subscribe to Mash in Donbass

description: A discussion on radio exchange security highlights that even if frequencies are visible, no secret information is revealed. Radio amateurs can already listen to open communication channels. Leaks of crew data occur through other hierarchies, not from online photos or videos.
original:
C'mon majors, if you actually saw “secret frequencies” in this excerpt of the video (which has already been deleted at the request of the author), then my respects...

Don't stop the men from working. Even if they had not covered up the numbers on that video and the moment where the frequencies are actually visible, they would not have given out any secret information (in fact, not on paper).
Our radio exchange, if it is conducted (and often is) not through closed communication channels, is listened to by all interested radio amateurs.
I'll tell you more. At the beginning, crests got on the air calling the pilots by name. And believe me, this data was leaked not thanks to photos and videos from the Internet.

Data about crews performing tasks in such and such zones, at such and such times, goes from place A, to place B, and from there to place C via R communication channels, which I am sure are not tapped (you control this). This data leaks from a slightly different hierarchy. Which? I don’t know - that’s your job, guys🤝But you shouldn’t bully guys for these pixels. They risk their lives every day just by getting into a helicopter.
Thank you for your attention, I hope it is adequate. We are doing one thing.

Sincerely, H.P.

By the way, the video was top. @milhelipilot
